song.title: ZX??? Only For Fun!
song.info: "Hello again! This incredible tune dedicated to all (ex)ZX and AMIGA users ! ...Now 13.09.98..three days ago, i get from C.T.Sam four Funtop98 ZX disk images... After viewing it's content my mood has no range,and i started tracking the module... The module contain four themes: 1 - Originally from ZXgame "StarTrip" 2 - Originally from ZXgame "Sigma-T" 3 - Originally from ZXgame "Turrican-II" 4 - Originally from The Lyra-II Megademo (part 8) Theme 3 has a little major improvement by me. Laser disco forever@ Sample statistics: 2 y.e. - from CD collection. 3 y.e. - from my synth 1 y.e. - CD RIP any one - from my HDD collection... Coming soon Bytefall98... ...hear around..a TRUE REVERB effect on just 20 channels! :+) "
